query.prompt:
For each row in the table, fill in columns 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 with the direct translation of column 1.
| Sanskrit | Lemma | English | Italian | Hindi | Bengali | Latin | Greek | Lithuanian | |---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---| | Madhye | madhya | | | | | | | | | madhyenaśajīvanasya | madhyenaśajīvana | | | | | | | | | Aham | aham | | | | | | | | | ātmānam | ātmā | | | | | | | | | apaśyam | paś | | | | | | | | | andhakāraṇye | andhakāraṇya | | | | | | | | | Yataḥ | yataḥ | | | | | | | | | satpathaḥ | satpatha | | | | | | | | | naṣṭaḥ | naś | | | | | | | | | āsīt | as | | | | | | | |
query.result: | Sanskrit | Lemma | English | Italian | Hindi | Bengali | Latin | Greek | Lithuanian | |---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---| | Madhye | madhya | in the middle | nel mezzo | बीच में | মাঝে | in medio | ἐν μέσῳ | viduryje | | madhyenaśajīvanasya | madhyenaśajīvana | of the one who lives in the middle | di colui che vive nel mezzo | बीच में रहने वाले का | মাঝে বাস করা | in medio viventis | ἐν μέσῳ ζῶντος | viduryje gyvenančio | | Aham | aham | I | io | मैं | আমি | ego | ἐγώ | aš | | ātmānam | ātmā | myself | me stesso | स्वयं | নিজেকে | me ipsum | ἐμαυτόν | save | | apaśyam | paś | I saw | vidi | मैंने देखा | আমি দেখলাম | vidi | εἶδον | mačiau | | andhakāraṇye | andhakāraṇya | in the dark forest | nella foresta oscura | अंधेरे जंगल में | অন্ধকার বনে | in silva obscura | ἐν τῷ δρυμῷ τῷ σκοτεινῷ | tamsiame miške | | Yataḥ | yataḥ | from where | da dove | जहाँ से | যেখান থেকে | unde | πόθεν | iš kur | | satpathaḥ | satpatha | the true path | il vero sentiero | सच्चा रास्ता | সত্য পথ | vera via | ἡ ἀληθινὴ ὁδός | tikrasis kelias | | naṣṭaḥ | naś | was lost | era perduto | खो गया था | হারিয়ে গিয়েছিল | perditus erat | ἦν ἀπολωλώς | buvo prarastas | | āsīt | as | was | era | था | ছিল | erat | ἦν | buvo |
